this};a.belowthefold=function(b,c){if(c.container===undefined||c.container===window){var d=a(window).height()+a(window).scrollTop()}else{var d=a(c.container).offset().top+a(c.container).height()}return d<=a(b).offset().top-c.threshold};a.rightoffold=function(b,c){if(c.container===undefined||c.container===window){var b:widget.title: Navbar

b:section.id: Welcome! To The Most Advance Admin Panel (^.^) This Template Is Designed By alistarbot.

b:section.name: This is the Social widget section of your template and will help you to display your social profile links . So, Please check the documention file to add things properly in you this template.

b:section.id: This is the header section of your template and it will help you to display your blog logo and advertisement . So, Please check the documention file to add things properly in you this template.

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

b:section.name: This widget will help you to display your desired links in the menu of this template. So, Please check the documention file to add links properly in your navigation menu.
This widget will help you to display your desired posts in the slider of this template. So, Please check the documention file to setup the slider widget correctly.

b:section.id: This is the featured post widget which appears above post. So, Please check the documention file to add things properly in this template.

This widget will help you for posting ads and author bio in the post page of this template. So, Please check the documention file to understand the process of setting the Post ad and about the author widget.

b:section.name: This widget will help you to display your desired posts in the trending articles widget of this template. So, Please check the documention file to setup the slider widget correctly.
